Schools Guide is a graduation project by students: Andrew Ashraf, Ganna tu Allah Sherif, Hager Saad, and Rawan Haitham. Our mission is to make it easy for parents to find and apply to suitable schools for their children using technology. We provide comprehensive details about each school, including pictures, website links, location, prices, reviews, and system. Our aim is to solve the problem of parents finding it hard to search for suitable schools and provide a valuable service to many families.
Version: V.1 Beta
Developer Info: Andrew Ashraf \nPhone Number: 01275457893 \nEmail:Thisisandrwashrf@gmail.com
